TopicTitle: HELP!!! i cant acess to update!

Articles.Content:
Ive needed to forcestop the update of 0.24 and now i cant enter it to update, whats wrong? D:

It says "Couldent find globalmanager011"..... please help, i want a budget here!!!!!

Anyway, hi im new, nice to meet you:).

Hello and welcome! I'm no expert at this, but I've had it when the KSP update zip download has an error and I have to restart the download. I suggest either redoing the download, or trying the installer. If you've done these already and this doesn't answer anything, ask other people sorry~

Later!
#### yeah!!! The patcher fixed it!!! Thanks man!!!
